sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faCreditCard } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { useNavigation } from 'react-navi' const CartTable: React.FunctionComponent = () => { const data = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('items') as string) const navigation = useNavigation() const deleteItem = (e: any): any => { const index = e.target.getAttribute('data-key') const listValue = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('items') as string) listValue.splice(index, 1) localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(listValue)) window.location.reload() } const deleteAll = (): any => { localStorage.removeItem('items') const itemsArray: any = [] localStorage.setItem('items', JSON.stringify(itemsArray)) window.location.reload() } const onClick = (): any => { if (data.length < 1) { console.log('error') } else { navigation.navigate('/checkout').then(() => { console.log('ok') }) } } const result = data.reduce(function (tot: any, arr: any) { return tot + arr.price }, 0) const tax = 15 const value = 2 return (
{data.map((dat: any, key: any) => ( ))}
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price

{dat.name}
{dat.price} {dat.price * value}

Order Details

Shipping and additional costs are calculated based on values you have entered

Subtotal
{result}
Tax
{tax}
Total
{result + tax}
) } export default CartTable
